sourceOrganization.name: NIAID ADRN Network
sourceOrganization.abstract: The Atopic Dermatitis Research Network (ADRN) is a consortium of academic medical centers studying skin infections associated with atopic dermatitis. The network conducts clinical research to improve understanding and treatment of these infections.
sourceOrganization.description: The Atopic Dermatitis Research Network (ADRN) is a consortium of academic medical centers that conduct clinical research studies to learn more about skin infections associated with atopic dermatitis. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/atopic-dermatitis-research-network
